Articles.Content: Im aiming at getting the 0.20 update out today.
Please also do an updated standalone version for the Docking Cam

Im aiming at getting the 0.20 update out today.

Thanks Romfarer. Looking forward to it.

Heck yeah, I was hoping for a quick response like that from a dev!

I wish I could tap into my limited Javascript skills and stuff, I don't use C++.
That would be very nice

Im aiming at getting the 0.20 update out today.

Excellent.

lazor version 27 is coming soon and it will use all the fancy stuff added in 0.20

it's possible that the launch clamps will not explode anymore. Anyone sad to see that feature go?

You just made my day! Thank you

WOOT... your dah bomb Rom.

thanks for the speedy update, drowning in tears over here from all the mods losses :'(

well seeing as how currently now the launch clamps find you half way up into orbit and kraken your ship to death, i guess ill have to compromise and give up my love for all that explodes(that isnt my ship) LOL

again THANKS Rom
are launch clamps still following you????
@Romfarer I love the docking cam, its very very useful. But could it please have a full color screen like the robot arms.. It would help docking in the dark much easier

Romfarer

Yes, old problem here.

Need update plugin

@Romfarer I love the docking cam, its very very useful. But could it please have a full color screen like the robot arms.. It would help docking in the dark much easier

Same options like for Lazor system itself would be nice - Night, invert, normal, thermo.
Oh yeah, launch clamps are bugged in a big way. I liked it better when they just exploded instead of exploding my ship! XD
Best not to use them then.

Nice to hear a new update for this is coming out. I was just about to start using it, and the 0.20 update hit not five minutes later, in real time.

Out of curiosity, how will the integrated docking clamp cameras work with the new mod directory setup? Will we still have to overwrite the stock docking ports?

I am not sad to see the explosive launch clamps to go. Was kinda weird you forced a bug fix for a bug that not everyone got. Then again, I don't understand KSP one bit as some things work for most people, but there's a lucky few like me that finds a bug that shouldn't exist.

Best not to use them then.
Unfortunately the addons that are the only reason I play KSP require them. :X
Will you ever fix RC?
I adapted ioncross mod for myself now I justt need kethane and this Lazor system

Changelog v27 (May 24):

  • KSP 0.20 Compatibility enabled

All plugins updated. Available here http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/?s=%20&author_name=Romfarer

Enjoy!
Awesome job with updating to KSP 0.20! Another most-have mod update off my wishlist.

The docking cam download does not come with modified part.cfgs for the docking ports. Is this normal?

Also, shouldn't the .dll go into "Romfahrer\Plugins"?

The docking cam download does not come with modified part.cfgs for the docking ports. Is this normal?

Also, shouldn't the .dll go into "Romfahrer\Plugins"?

Yes this is normal. And the plugins are put where they are supposed to go ;-) Let me know if you find any in-game issues.
Thank you Romfarer! So great to have the docking cam back.

Yes this is normal. And the plugins are put where they are supposed to go ;-) Let me know if you find any in-game issues.

Any harm done if I've already updated .20's docking ports with the "module" entry?

(Wow, that was quick!)
